Web Designer
Post Date: 02/22/2010
Location: Toronto , ON
Assignment: Full Time
Pay Rate: $60,000 to $70,000 per year
Start Date: 01/11/2010
Industry: Printing/Publishing
Job Order Number: 512-017797
Requirements:
1. Created at least 1 large CMS site preferably utilizing Drupal however equal Joomla skills will be acceptable. 2. 3+ years of CMS (Content Management system) experience is required. Search Engine Optimization experience in excess of 3 years is required. 3. 5+ years experience with HTML, CSS, PHP, and MY SQL is required. 4. Administration experience with Free BSD Systems for 3+ years is required. 5. 3 + years with Apache Web Server is required. 6. Exposure to CARP, BSD Jails and Squid proxy server is an asset. 7. Experience working for and internet service provider is an asset.
Description:
Our client, a large advertising and marketing company, requires a Drupal(CMS) Developer. Experience must include Systems Administration work within a Free BSD environment. This permanent, Full-time role will report to the Manager of I.T and will involve 75% development with PHP and 25 % Systems Administration of the Free BSD operating system. Specific responsibilities include 1. Creating (CMS) Content Management Systems, designed to ease the process of adding and modifying new content to the internal webpage. The pages content is stored in the database, verses in the file server and is created in Drupal 6. 2. Demonstrated aptitude improving the volume and quality of traffic for the SEO( Search Engine Optimization) of multiple web pages. 3. Primarily utilizing PHP, HTML, and MY SQL for development of the required modules and application within the CMS. 4. Administration of Free BSD Systems with the environment. 5. Exposure to protocols such as CARP (Common Address Redundancy Protocol). 6. Knowledge of FreeBSD jail (operating system-level virtualization for open source systems) 7. Knowledge of Proxy Servers such as Squid. Please send all resumes to Sean.simon@rht.com quoting ref #512-017797
